page.title: 02CHURCHES IN PRENTON
page.content: There are six churches serving the community of Prenton, St Stephen and St Alban Church of England, Prenton Methodist, Prenton United Reformed, Bethany Chapel and the Mormons. {Prenton Methodist Church}holds Sunday Services at 11am and 6-30pm and Sunday school at 11-30am. There are youth activities like Cubs, Brownies, Guides, Scouts, Playschool and a Drama group. During the week there are a Vestry Fellowship, a Wives' Group and a Women's Fellowship. {Bethany Chapel}is a nonconformist church, run by the 7 Elders and 7 Deacons. About 100 people attend the 3 services on Sunday. The Chapel caters for all age groups. There are a youth movement called the Covenanters, a coffee bar for mums, a luncheon group for pensioners and a play group for toddlers.
